summary:
Spanish is a widely spoken language with around 500 million native speakers, mainly in the Americas and Spain. It's one of the world's most popular languages, ranking second in native speakers after Mandarin Chinese.

Originating from Vulgar Latin on the Iberian Peninsula, it developed into a distinct language by the 9th century. Spanish colonialism spread the language globally, especially to the Americas. Today, it's an official language in 20 countries and one of the UN's six official languages. Spanish is also a popular language to learn worldwide.
title: Spanish language
